title: Joining ZOOM meetings doesn't work Firefox, works Chrome or Edge
content:
Joining ZOOM meetings doesn't work in Firefox, works fine in Chrome or Edge - A zoom link for a class (via Canvas, if that matters) will not open zoom. Used to work a month ago. Edge or Chrome works fine. Any suggestions?? thx,

.
creator: markeh

title: "Sign in with Google" not working
content: I'm trying to sign in to a site that uses "Sign in with Google" but it's not working. I click the button, the page loads, but then the sign in with Google button comes right back. I've cleared cookies and cache and restarted my browser, disabled pop-up blocker, and tried in a private browsing session but its always the same thing
creator: me10lee83

title: My bookmark is now synced correctly
content:
Hi support team,

I have met this issue twice. Before I retired my old PC, I did click the "sync now". However, when I login in Firefox in my new PC, I found the bookmarks are very very out of date. Because my old PC was formatted, I lost my latest bookmarks in Firefox.

Could you help with this?

Eason BR
creator: lxfyc314

title: Facebook scrolling starts flashing and removing posts from the newsfeed.  This doesn't occur using other browsers.
content: I've recently noticed that scrolling the newsfeed in Facebook starts flashing and removing content, uncontrolled scrolling and removing content that had previously been at the top of my feed. Performing the same activity in Edge does not have this behavior.
creator: skyking1
